X.i.1.1.d
.
Use of VA Form 20-10207
VA Form 20-10207, Priority Processing Request
, is available for a claimant, a claimant’s authorized third-party representative, or a claimant’s authorized power of attorney for use to bring to the VA’s attention an assertion that a priority status may apply.
Important
:  Use of this form is not a requirement to request priority processing.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1 - Priority Processing Programs and Special Requirements
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section None
